name: 周至如
objective:

七。線路保護

九。熔絲
十。保護協調

schedule:
1.Introductions, scope, definitions, basic concepts and important issues descriptions.(week 1)
2. power system protection fundamental, problems and solutions..(week 1) 　
3. power system fault characteristics, analysis methods and protection considerations..(week 2) 　
4. overview the related standards of power system protections and the
protection methodology..(week 3)
5. protective relays performances and their practical aspects on application and considerations..(week 4)
6. relay system input sources and associated devices especially the
performances of current transformers (CT) and voltage transformer..(week 5)
7. the primary protections with current differential protections and some backup protection methods..(week 6
8. generator system protections: primary protection descriptions and
protection scheme planning and design. .(week 7)
9. midterm and report, generator system protections:backup and supplementary protections descriptions..(week 8)
10. generators protection scheme planning and design..(week9)
11. transformer protection planning and design..(week 10)
12. reactor and capacitor bank protection planning and design..(week 11)
13. bus protections planning and design considering various bus scheme..(week 12)
14. motor protections planning and design considering starting, abnormal operations and faults..(week 13)
15. substation protection planning: outdoor types and indoor type based on gas insulated switchgear (GIS)-PART1. .(week 14)　
16. substation protection planning: outdoor types and indoor type
based on gas insulated switchgear (GIS)-PART2..(week 15)
17 transmission line system protections: overhead transmission
lines ..(week 16)
18.transmission line system protections: underground cables ..(week 17)
19.protection associated system stability, final examination ..(week 18)
scorePolicy: 評量方式：期中考佔 30%，期末考佔 30%，學習報告 / 作業佔 20％，平常表現（含出席率）佔 20%。
materials:
本課程依進度進行授課，以課堂講解為主，輔以資料補充，主要教才為：
(1) J. Lewis. Blackburn, Protective Relaying Principles & Application,
     Marcel Dekker Inc., 1987
(2) S. H. Horowitz, A. G. Phadke, Power System Relaying, 2nd Edition, John 
     Wiley  &  Sons Inc.1995
(3) A. G. Phadke, J. S. Thorp, Computer Relaying for Power System,John 
     Wiley  &  Sons Inc.1998
(4) J. Lewis,  Blackburn, Tmomas, J. Domin, Protective Relaying Principles & 
     Application,CRC Press Taylor & Francis Group, LLC,  2006
consultation: 每週提供固時段 (1 小時 / 週以上) 實體諮商。學生可事先預約時間諮商。另可 E-mail 或群組發布訊息或即時討論。以上細節開學後說明。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
remarks: 本課程以實體上課為主，倘因疫情需要，將依學校公布遠距教學規定，採 google meet 或 Microsoft Teams 遠距較學、期中考試或期末考試，細節開學後說明。
